item.title: Amanda add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "the buddhists say there are 149 ways to god. i'm not looking for god, only for myself, and that is far more complicated." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "Long looking at paintings is equivalent to being dropped into a foreign city, where gradually, out of desire and despair, a few key words, then a little syntax make a clearing in the silence. Art... is a foreign city, and we deceive ourselves when we think it familiar... We have to recognize that the language of art, all art, is not our mother-tongue." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Amanda add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "The continuous narrative of existence is a lie. There is no continuous narrative, there are lit-up moments, and the rest is dark." -- Jeanette Winterson
